case_title: COMMISSIONER INLAND REVENUE, ZONE-IV vs Messrs HAZARA EFFICIENT GAS, KARACHI

facts.respondent_business: Import and sale of Liquefied Petroleum Gas (LPG)
facts.process: Licensed by OGRA to import bulk LPG, blend, mix, filter, add odor regularizers, bottle into small cylinders, and distribute for domestic and industrial use
facts.tax_adjustment: Tax deducted at import stage treated as adjustable under section 148(7) of Income Tax Ordinance, 2001

issues.revision_notice: Issued under sections 122(5A)/122(9) of Income Tax Ordinance, 2001
issues.ADCIR_position: Respondent not considered an 'industrial undertaking' under section 2(29C) of Income Tax Ordinance, 2001
issues.respondent_reply: Provided evidence of manufacturing process, employment of more than 10 employees, use of electrical energy, and compliance with OGRA safety standards

appeal_details.CIR_Appeals_I_decision: Respondent qualifies as an industrial undertaking under section 2(29C) of Income Tax Ordinance, 2001
appeal_details.parallel_case: Pyramid Gas (Pvt.) Ltd. I.T.A. 1130/LB/2016 used as precedent
appeal_details.respondent_arguments: Provided evidence of manufacturing process, exemption certificate, and case law supporting industrial undertaking status

findings.industrial_undertaking_status: Respondent meets statutory requirements under sections 2(29C) and 153(7) of Income Tax Ordinance, 2001
findings.manufacturing_process: Blending, mixing, filtering, and bottling LPG qualifies as manufacturing
findings.precedent_case: Pyramid Gas (Pvt.) Ltd. I.T.A. 1130/LB/2016 deemed identical in facts and law
